# Catalyst Configuration (from .catalystrc and catalyst.json)
NEXT_PUBLIC_CATALYST_PROJECT_ID=30300000000011038
NEXT_PUBLIC_CATALYST_ENV_ID=891140386
NEXT_PUBLIC_CATALYST_API_KEY=your_api_key_here
NEXT_PUBLIC_CATALYST_DOMAIN=project-rainfall-891140386.development.catalystserverless.com

# Zoho Configuration (Client-side)
NEXT_PUBLIC_ZOHO_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id_here

# Zoho Configuration (Server-side - DO NOT expose to client)
ZOHO_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id_here
ZOHO_CLIENT_SECRET=your_client_secret_here
ZOHO_REFRESH_TOKEN=your_refresh_token_here

# Application Configuration
NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=development
NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL=http://localhost:3000

# API Configuration
NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=your_api_url_here
NEXT_PUBLIC_CATALYST_CRM_URL=your_catalyst_crm_url_here

# Server (Function) Configuration
# Catalyst function URL used by Next.js proxies (container-to-container)
CONTRACT_FN_URL=http://express-backend:9000/server/project_rainfall_function
# Zoho OAuth access token (server-side). Provide via secure secret store.
ZOHO_OAUTH_TOKEN=your_runtime_access_token_here
# Optional base URLs (default to production endpoints if omitted)
ZOHO_SIGN_BASE_URL=https://sign.zoho.com/api/v1
ZOHO_CRM_BASE_URL=https://www.zohoapis.com/crm/v3
# Webhook signature secret for Zoho Sign callbacks
ZOHO_SIGN_WEBHOOK_SECRET=replace_with_random_32_bytes_hex
